title: Similar to Circular/Brown but condensed
content:
Hey,  
iam searching for a condensed font that is similar in beauty to Circular (or Brown) from lineto?  
I found some condensed weights of Brown but only in bold/black...

Do you have any idea?

thanks,  
M
author: TKK

comments.content: Futura Condensed seems a bit "too condensed" for what i have in mind.

Maybe 'Proxima Nova Condensed'? (It has an alternate single story lowercase 'a')

[http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/proxima-nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021808/http:/www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/proxima-nova "http://www.marksimonson.com/fonts/view/proxima-nova")

I found out JAF Bernino Sans Condensed is a very good looking font but to keep the geometric style, Circular is based on, i now use Avenir Next.

Thank you Les
